_comment: Cascadia Mobile Systems Lab â€” Prompt Version Manifest. Hashes are SHA-256 of the prompt file contents. Never modify existing versioned prompts; create a new version directory instead.

system_decompose.description: Decomposes a research question into a structured plan with hypotheses and steps

system_retrieve.description: Generates search queries and evaluates source relevance

system_analyze.description: Extracts structured evidence from retrieved source content

system_synthesize.description: Synthesizes evidence into a structured analytical response with limitations

system_critique.description: Performs self-evaluation of the synthesis, identifying gaps and assigning confidence
